main event: A blue-white colored object was observed by an aircraft pilot in the Pacific Ocean.
interesting points: The object was reported to be definitely larger than a star.
The object's course was straight, and it moved at a rapid speed.
The object was visible for approximately 10 minutes, but suddenly disappeared and then later resurfaced.
The object was estimated to be 15-20 miles in front of the aircraft at 10,000 feet, with an approximate size of 5 degrees.
The object exhibited fast maneuvers and changes in direction, leading to the possibility of it being a reflective phenomenon or a secret military aircraft.
